alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County; Goshen County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 02 at 1:49PM MST until January 04 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts around 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Eastern plains of Wyoming and the southern Nebraska Panhandle, mainly areas east of Interstate 25. * WHEN...Tuesday morning through late Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: A High Wind Watch means there is the potential for a hazardous high wind event. Sustained winds of at least 40 mph...or gusts of 58 mph or stronger may occur. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
